about_the_game:
Plan Your Attack

Rogue Conflict introduces players to several army factions, each containing various unit types. From infantry units to armored tanks, each faction features its own playstyle. Depending on the map’s terrain and enemy types, players must select their offensive units and plan their attacks accordingly.

 

Turn-Based Tactics

Deploy your units in strategic formations that anticipate your opponent’s next move. Use artillery, tanks, aircraft, infantry, and more in the game’s turn-based battles. As your opponent’s offensive front grows stronger, strong weaponry and strategic deployment are crucial to your success. Deplete your enemy’s morale and strength to zero and claim each map’s objectives to succeed!

Roguelike Features

Rogue Conflict’s procedurally-generated elements challenge players on grid-based maps. Plan your attacks based on the surrounding terrain, available units, and the enemy’s position. If you’re overcome in battle, you lose the progress made during your offensive and should restrategize for the next encounter.

Customize Your Army

As you complete different missions, use your rewards to request stronger reinforcements and purchase unit upgrades to strengthen your attacks. Rogue Conflict’s Reinforcement Points (RP) are rewarded for your wins and can be exchanged for enemy intelligence reports, unit upgrades, and additional boons.

Key Features

  • Choose from 15 different armies to coordinate your most effective plan of attack.

  • Randomized map combinations challenge players' combat skills on land and in the air.

  • The game’s upgrade system offers boons to weapons, reinforcement types, and large battle equipment such as tanks and aircraft.

  • Run campaigns from a commander’s perspective, managing complete control over your army’s every move in battle.

Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Rogue Conflict is a turn-based strategy roguelike. Combining tactical wargame combat with procedural roguelike features, Rogue Conflict is an approachable entry for wargamers and roguelike enthusiasts alike.
